title: Random input for proxy port will cause crush.

labels.name: Type: Possible bug
labels.description: Issues that seem to be a bug, but haven't been confirmed yet

body:
### Checklist

- [X] I have used the search function for [open](https://github.com/AntennaPod/AntennaPod/issues) **and** [closed](https://github.com/AntennaPod/AntennaPod/issues?q=is%3Aissue+is%3Aclosed) issues to see if someone else has already submitted the same bug report.
- [X] I will describe the problem with as much detail as possible.
- [X] If the bug only to occurs with a certain podcast, I will include the URL of that podcast.

### App version

2.7.1

### Where did you get the app from

Other

### Android version

Android 9.0

### Device model

Emulator Google Pixel 2

### First occurred

about 6 days ago

### Steps to reproduce

1. Enter Settings-Network-Proxy
2. Change type to HTTP or SOCKS
3. Random input something to the input box of Port such as "12.8" or "a" (comment: the input box seems to ban abnormal inputs, but you can do this by UIAutomator)
4. Change type back to DIRECT  (comment: if you don change the type back to DIRECT and click "Test", the app will operate normally and the abnormal input will be found by test)
5. Click OK and the app will crush

Although this my not be easy to trigger by a normal user, I still think this may cause any other problem, hope these infos could help.

### Expected behaviour

Nothing happen (the app should not crush) and the inputs may be automatically deleted because you choose the "DIRECT" mode.

### Current behaviour


https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/119578731/205440712-edbdf280-721f-4841-b0ca-609785d6ee82.mp4



### Logs
```

FATAL EXCEPTION: main
    Process: de.danoeh.antennapod.debug, PID: 23345
    java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "a"
        at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:615)
        at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:650)
        at de.danoeh.antennapod.dialog.ProxyDialog.setProxyConfig(ProxyDialog.java:166)
        at de.danoeh.antennapod.dialog.ProxyDialog.lambda$show$0$ProxyDialog(ProxyDialog.java:79)
        at de.danoeh.antennapod.dialog.-$$Lambda$ProxyDialog$RzobMJe551CApAx12SDaJVlIcRE.onClick(Unknown Source:2)
        at android.view.View.performClick(View.java:6597)
        at com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton.performClick(MaterialButton.java:1119)
        at android.view.View.performClickInternal(View.java:6574)
        at android.view.View.access$3100(View.java:778)
        at android.view.View$PerformClick.run(View.java:25885)
        at android.os.Handler.handleCallback(Handler.java:873)
        at android.os.Handler.dispatchMessage(Handler.java:99)
        at android.os.Looper.loop(Looper.java:193)
        at android.app.ActivityThread.main(ActivityThread.java:6669)
        at java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Native Method)
        at com.android.internal.os.RuntimeInit$MethodAndArgsCaller.run(RuntimeInit.java:493)
        at com.android.internal.os.ZygoteInit.main(ZygoteInit.java:858)
```
